ComicInfo.Summary:
Dr. Stellar is inducted into The Knights of Justice as an active member, replacing Knight Watchman, who's stepped down to the status of honorary member.
The Badge saves Dr. Reinstein from Nazi kidnappers.
Ultiman and Knight Watchman meet for the first time; the seven heroes decide to form a group, The Knights of Justice.
